Jens von Bergmann

Demo.Rmd
library(VancouvR)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
library(ggplot2)

Get a list of property related datasets

list_cov_datasets() %>%
  filter(grepl("property",title,ignore.case = TRUE)) %>%
  select(dataset_id,title)
#> Parsed with column specification:
#> cols(
#>   `datasetid;custom.note;custom.data-owner;custom.data-team;custom.search-term;default.title;default.description;default.theme;default.keyword;default.license;default.license_url;default.language;default.timezone;default.modified;default.modified_updates_on_metadata_change;default.modified_updates_on_data_change;default.data_processed;default.metadata_processed;default.geographic_reference;default.geographic_reference_auto;default.publisher;default.references;default.records_count;default.attributions;default.source_domain;default.source_domain_title;default.source_domain_address;default.source_dataset;default.shared_catalog;default.federated;default.oauth_scope;default.parent_domain;dcat.created;dcat.issued;dcat.creator;dcat.contributor;dcat.contact_name;dcat.contact_email;dcat.accrualperiodicity;dcat.spatial;dcat.temporal;dcat.granularity;dcat.dataquality` = col_character()
#> )
#> Warning: 1257 parsing failures.

#> 8 property-parcel-polygons          Property parcel polygons

Get data for property tax report and property polygons

tax_data <- get_cov_data(dataset_id = "property-tax-report",where="tax_assessment_year=2019") %>%
  mutate_at(c("current_land_value","current_improvement_value"),as.numeric)
#> Downloading data from CoV Open Data portal
property_polygons <- get_cov_data(dataset_id="property-parcel-polygons",format = "geojson")
#> Downloading data from CoV Open Data portal

Compute and plot relative land values

plot_data <- property_polygons %>% 
  left_join(tax_data,by=c("tax_coord"="land_coordinate")) %>%
  mutate(rlv=current_land_value/as.numeric(sf::st_area(geometry))) %>%
  mutate(rlvd=cut(rlv,breaks=c(-Inf,1000,2000,3000,4000,5000,7500,10000,Inf),
                  labels=c("<$1k","$1k-$2k","$2k-$3k","$3k-$4k","$4k-$5k","$5k-$7.5k","$7.5k-$10k",">$10k"),
                  ordered_result = TRUE))
#> Linking to GEOS 3.7.2, GDAL 2.4.2, PROJ 5.2.0
ggplot(plot_data) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill=rlvd),color=NA) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(option="magma",na.value="darkgrey") +
  labs(title="2019 relative land values",fill="Value per m^2",caption="CoV Open Data") +
  coord_sf(datum=NA)
